cast.name: 伊莎贝尔·莎露妮 Isabel Sarli
Juan Carlos Altavista Juan Carlos Altavista

introduction: 阿根廷性感女神Isabel Sarli最著名的一部CULT影片。Isabel Sarli's most famous film. In Carne (Meat) we find Isabel Sarli playing the role of Delicia, a young virginal worker of a meat refrigerating factory. During the film she is raped time after time in the backside of a refrigerator truck by several rude workmates, being rescued a little too late by her boyfriend, the only man capable of seeing her pure soul thru her "delicious meat". A masterpiece of "kitsch".Delicia (Isabel Sarli) is a worker in a meat-packing factory where she becomes the victim of rapists. After she makes love to her boyfriend, she is gang-raped by workers who use a bed of frozen cattle carcasses in the refrigerator for the site of their assault. Her lover, an idealistic artist who dabbles in paint, discovers the violation and exacts his revenge on the criminals in a fury of fist fights. The feature is plagued by ridiculous dialogue, particularly in one scene after the rape as Delicia is approached by two men, and she asks "What are your intentions?"
